lead_paragraph: Seattle Seahawks cornerback Richard Sherman confirmed Thursday he's been fined by the NFL for his hit on Buffalo kicker Dan Carpenter in last Monday's game against the Bills.

headline.print_headline: Seahawks' Richard Sherman Fined for Hit vs. Buffalo
headline.main: Seahawks' Richard Sherman Fined for Hit vs. Buffalo

snippet: Seattle Seahawks cornerback Richard Sherman confirmed Thursday he's been fined by the NFL for his hit on Buffalo kicker Dan Carpenter in last Monday's game against the Bills....
